title: CDFD Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 09 Technical Officer, Junior Assistant Posts
description: The Centre for DNA Fingerprinting and Diagnostics (CDFD) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 09 Technical Officers, Junior Assistants, Skilled Work Assistants, and  Junior Managerial Assistants. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc, M.Sc, Diploma, Any Degree, 12th, 10th, B.E./B. Tech, Post-graduation, can apply for the CDFD Recruitment 202...
